fr.ign.cogit.geoxygene.appli.task

Class AtomicAbstractTask

  • Object
    • AbstractTask
      • AtomicAbstractTask
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Task, Runnable

    public abstract class AtomicAbstractTask
extends AbstractTask
    Author:
    JeT An Atomic task is a task which can give its progress value, can be paused and stopped. All state changes are already managed in the run method which call atomicLoop() method iteratively. The only pending points to implements are: - implement initializeTask() method which is called before entering loop - implement atomicLoop() method with a short computation task - implement finalizeTask() method which is called when atomicLoop won't be ever re-entered - use setProgress( 0..1 ) method to set task progress value - use setFinished(true) to end main loop
